data.eml:eml: Terrestrial molluscs of Pemba Island, Zanzibar, Tanzania, and its status as an " oceanic " island

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rowson, B, Warren, B. H., Ngereza, C. F. (2010): Terrestrial molluscs of Pemba Island, Zanzibar, Tanzania, and its status as an " oceanic " island. ZooKeys 70: 1-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.70.762, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.70.762
